review: **** ****** ** ******* **** **** ***** *She always make me comfortable while my checkups .She gives positive vibes only .Most of your problem gets resolved just by talking with her .I will definately recomend her

My baby was getting these stomach cramps and gastric problems after mid night. Dr Richa was very understanding & polite person to deal with. She took the initiative of checking my baby from head to toe including her weight, size etc. 
Dr Richa was genuinely concerned about her patient and gave us some important tips which we were not aware of and m sure all parent are not aware as well and they should know. Besides she also gave enough time to us to answer all our questions. I recommend this doctor as one of the best doctor and person in the city. If you reside in Rohini or Pitampura or nearby area, one must visit her for consultation. Her clinic is not very flashy it's simple but the doctor Is super intelligent and highly qualifies & highly experienced.
Few flashy clinics with doctors we visited in the past, misguide us with baby care but Dr Richa put us on right track with baby care & treatments. She is gonna be our permanent pediatric from now on.
Thank You Doctor for your help & support today.

Superb and blessings experience fabulous doctor....with excellent experience.üôè
My son suffering from stomach infection..she didn't get any kind of test  she just put her  hand on his stomach and find out all issues.Otherwise in this situation... doctors recommend go through various tests.. painful for child and parents too.... Doctor turn out to be blessings for me and my child.

Very good doctor. Listens patiently. Gets a good understanding of the issues faced by patient. Prescribed the ***** medicine. Did not go outrightly for diagnostic tests unnecessarily. Told that take medicine for 2 days, if still issue persists, then we will go for tests. Really liked that. Was also available on mobile as we had to clarify one thing. 

Most importantly, my kiddo is well now with her medicine.

Highly recommended.

A big thank you Doc !!! :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Very polite and friendly doctor. Give proper time to patients, understands their problems and give best possible solution. Never prescribes unnecessary medicine, try to keep medicine to minimum and suggest the precautions. Very cooperative with babies. She Is always available on call.

My overall experience was good. She discussed at length all the details. Waiting time is not long. Medicine is also available at her clinic so no need to go to a medical store additionaly. It was the first and only time so honestly can not tell much about expertise but in person she is very cool and calm.
My baby is suffering from cold and that is reason i visited, the doctor is very calm and knowledeable and she has treated us nicely.
She is very nice to talk, listens patiently and gives almost painless injections. I recommend her for paediatric treatment. *** ********* ** ** ** **** ** *** *** ****** ***********

Got good consulting. And can see the medication also not too much.
Hence feels the treatment may go in good direction.
